scripts.dev: npm run kube:dev:build; npm run kube:dev
scripts.int: npm run kube:dev:build; npm run kube:int
scripts.kube:e2e: npm run kube:dev; cd apps/client; CLIENT_HOST=dso.local CLIENT_PORT=80 npm run cypress:open
scripts.kube:e2e-ci: npm run kube:prod; cd apps/client; CLIENT_HOST=dso.local CLIENT_PORT=80 npm run cypress:run
scripts.test:ct: pnpm --filter shared run build; pnpm --filter client run cypress:open-ct
scripts.test:ct-ci: pnpm --filter shared run build; pnpm --filter client run cypress:run-ct
scripts.test:e2e: npm run kube:dev:build; npm run kube:e2e
scripts.test:e2e-ci: npm run kube:prod:build; npm run kube:e2e-ci
